t: Watch how Amazon delivers to customers at the bottom of the Grand Canyon
s: Saddle up and take a ride on a mule to discover how Amazon delivers to customers at the bottom of the Grand Canyon. Watch the video to learn how the people—and mules—powering Amazon’s delivery network get packages to Phantom Ranch, Arizona.
